# blockedIdentities

**Instance Property**

A list of users blocked from requesting access to this share.

## Declaration

```swift
var blockedIdentities: [CKShare.BlockedIdentity] { get }
```

## Discussion

Identities remain in this list until an owner or administrator calls [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKShare/unblockIdentities(_:)].
title: blockedIdentities
